##Code Book
The following list give the description of the variables in the data set at stage 4 of the requirements. 
The codebook is ok also for part 5 considering that only variable volunteer and activity_ext are present, while all the features are the same.

1. ID_set: the identification tag for each of the 2 random set in which volunteers results have been divided.

2. ID_vol: The identification number of each volunteer goes from 1 to 30.

3. ID_act: the identification number of each activity
          1-WALKING
          2-WALKING_UPSTAIRS
          3-WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS
          4-SITTING
          5-STANDING
          6-LAYING
          
4. activity_ext: The extended name of the activities as per list provided.
